sub_title: Senior Relationship Manager at the Youth Education Fund
summary: I am an experienced (10+years). qualified account and relationship manager, (corporate) fundraiser and marketing & communications professional. With an extensive knowledge of (and affinity with) international development, global challenges and sustainability issues, SDGs, CSR policies, private sector engagement and  business practices. Passionate about both the opportunities and challenges in the area of multi-stakeholder partnerships, relationships with (ultra) high networth people, impact investors and the ever increasing involvement of (social) businesses in sustainable development. I am a cheerful, enthusiastic, friendly, calm and thoughtful person with at the same time an energetic, growth and results-oriented personality. A strong networker who, driven by curiosity and a pursuit of positive change, loves to ignite energy, ideas and engagement and succeeds in connecting people, ideas, businesses and other stakeholders. In establishing, developing and extending relationships, partnership or engagement programmes, I’ll always look for shared value and (innovative) ways to create a positive impact for the community and society together, based on a shared purpose or social mission. Strong in consultative and conceptual selling

education.field_of_study: Foundations of Happiness, Erasmus Happiness Economics Research Organisation
Return on Happiness,  Erasmus Happiness Economics Research Organisation (EHERO)

education.degree_name: Executive Program Rendement van Geluk ( Return on investment of Happiness)

projects.title: Dijk van een Wijk
projects.description: Met de ‘Dijk van een Wijk’ competitie krijg je in Nederland de kans om jouw wijk op een duurzame manier leefbaarder en veiliger te maken. De beste ideeën om jouw wijk te verbeteren maken kans op max. €10.000,- aan prijzengeld om dit idee te realiseren! Met Dijk van een Wijk vragen we - samen met Het Rode Kruis, CARE Nederland en Wetlands International - aandacht voor de Filipijnen en het werken aan preventie van rampen zoals Typhoon Haiyan. Samen met de 35.000 inwoners van 150 wijken op Mindanao wordt er gewerkt aan 'Dijken van Wijken'. En nu dus niet alleen op de Filipijnen, maar ook in Nederland!

contributors.headline: Senior Relationship Manager at the Youth Education Fund
Loving Life with Cancer ❤️ - Sustainability - CSR - Marketing & Communications - Business Development
Partnership & Portfolio Coordinator at The Netherlands Red Cross

profile_positions.description: For this foundation, still a relative newcomer in the field of creating equal opportunities for and fighting poverty amongst children in primary schools, I contributed to the professionalisation of the marketing and fundraising. A.o. by the the development of a strategy to involve, join forces, establish relation- and partnerships and raise funds with corporations, corporate foundations, (high) networth people, families, trusts and the Lottery. The foundation provides primary schools with funds the teachers can use to help and support groups of children and/or individual children whose families or caretakers lack means and support, suffer from a lack of self-esteem and prospects for the future. It’s a small, dedicated team – 5 paid staff members  partly with fixed term contracts-  and the board members and a network of volunteers work along as well. Within this fast growing team, which strives for and succeeds  in doubling the amount of primary schools, teachers and related suppers,community and social workers  it works with I contributed to also doubling the funds raised and being provided and pledged anually. During the COVID-pandemic we managed to create a lot of recognition and positive free publicity, also leveraging the outreach, media&communications and events budgets and capacity of our strategic partners like the ABN AMRO Foundation.
profile_positions.title: Senior manager Relationships, Partnerships & Fundraiser, Youth Education Fund

profile_positions.description: For the Dutch Heart Foundation I developed, got approval and buy-in of the management and organisation for a longer term strategy and approach for establishing and creating relationships & partnerships with (ultra) high networth individuals, families, entrepreneurs, trusts and foundations. Being responsible for the implementation of that new strategy and approach I managed to build several relationships with (ultra) high networth individuals with a financial value of €250K and €500K within 18 months, by building trust and providing them appealing cases for support and propositions, supporting the impact goals and mission of the Heart Foundation and the Dutch Cardiovasculair Alliance.
profile_positions.title: Senior Relationship Manager high networth people, trusts & (family) foundations

profile_positions.description:
For CARE Nederland (member of the Geneva based confederation CARE International) I developed and implemented their first, longer term corporate alliance strategy. Based on the principle of Creating Shared Value and Purposeful Positioning and building upon and leveraging the Private Sector Engagement and Corporate Partnerships work of other members and country offices of CARE International. Based on that strategy and together with a new, small team I acquired the first global, comprehensive partnership of CARE Nederland and CARE International on Women’s Economic Empowerment, with the H&M Foundation. A worldwide program (10 countries in five regions) with a financial value of approx. €7M and one program in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, with a financial value of approx. €2.5M (raised through H&M’s yearly holiday and XMas campaign. More over, leveraging the (out)reach, media, marketingcommunications and innovation budgets and execution power of the H & M Hennes & Mauritz AB. Building additional multi-stakeholder initiatives and partnerships on the topic women’s entrepreneurship. By e.g. involving and engaging (high) networth individuals, organizing surveys and events with high profile partner organizations and agencies. Accenture, Accenture Development Partnerships, SMO and Erasmus Center for Enterpreneurship (ECE). See e.g. the event "The Power of Entrepreneurial Women Worldwide" in the Media below, which included former minister Ploumen for foreign trade and development cooperation, many relevant businesses and corporations, social entrepreneurs, students, experts and policy makers. 
Also: relationship manager for CARE Nederland’s key partnership with the Dutch National Postcode Lottery, financial value of approx. €1M per year, unrestricted funds. As well as in kind value and opportunities for raising restricted funds for special projects teaming up with other organizations
profile_positions.title: Manager Corporate Relations & Partnerships, CARE International / Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
September 2011 – June 2012 : freelance Consultant Marketing Communications&Fundraising, Producer
Commercial production company Chapel Media: development of the big idea and the production of the 3D-film “The Power of Nature”, a film that was screened by Oxfam Novib at the Floriade (World Horticultural Expo) in Venlo in 2012 (a film about the major flood in The Netherlands in 1953 and cyclone Nargis in Myanmar in 2008)
Oxfam Novib: development and execution of marketing communications plan around an extra grant of the Dutch National Postcode Lottery
profile_positions.title: Interim Consultant Marketing, Communications & Fundraising, Productions

profile_positions.description:
Marketing Communications Adviser, Account Manager, Oxfam Novib
A.o. the development, project and account management of Oxfam Novib’s first corporate partnership with SCA Benelux, part of the Swedish multinational SCA Hygiene Products (FMCG), nowadays Essity. A three-year partnership with financial support (in total approx. €1.5M) for hygiene programmes, products and services for children – extra focus on young girls-in primary schools in South Sudan and Niger. Development and execution, jointly with brand managers, marketeers, corporate communications and agencies of SCA, of the cause marketing and marketing communications campaigns (ATL and BTL) and B2B campaigns of the SCA brands Edet, Libresse, TENA and Tork. Together we won the SponsorRing in 2010, category Society and Social Responsibility.
Marketing, brand and communications advice in several advocacy and naming and shaming campaigns like the successful “Green Santa” campaign for fair(trade) chocolate in supermarkets and retail chains
profile_positions.title: Account Manager & Marketing Communications Adviser, Oxfam / The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Consultant Marketing, Communications, Stakeholder and Account Management, Spokesperson and Editor-in-chief
Greenport Westland-Oostland, ( at that time newly merged) municipality Lansingerland: interim adviser internal branding, strategic communications and city and regional marketing, account management, stakeholder management and engagement and spokesperson for the (at that time newly merged) municipality Lansingerland and Greenport Westland-Oostland (the largest horticulture business and knowledge area in the Netherlands) 
Save The Children: editor and editor-in-chief Annual Report 2008 – 2009.
Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs, various Radio and TV broadcasting stations and several magazines on international development and communications: various reporting and editing assignments
profile_positions.title: Consultant Marketing, Communications, Stakeholder and Account Management, Spokesperson

profile_positions.description:
Communications Adviser, Project and Campaign Manager, Editor and (internal) Reporter, Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs 
Development and execution of a PR and awareness campaign in The Netherlands about the enlargement of the European Union, corporate and communications advice to various internal accounts. News editor and reporter for the various internal and external media of the ministry, its embassies and consulates
profile_positions.title: Communications Adviser,Project and Campaign Manager,Editor and (internal) Reporter,Ministry of F.A.

profile_positions.location: Amsterdam Area, Netherlands, The Hague Area, Netherlands
profile_positions.description: For various news programmes of several public service broadcasters (KRO, AVRO, NCRV and RTV West) full- and part-time roles as editor , producer, reporter. Researching and preparing items, interviews, anchorman texts and scripts for various, writing anchorman texts and scripts. Daily live broadcasting radio programs from Sydney running up to the Olympics in 2000.
profile_positions.title: Editor and Reporter Radio and TV, Hilversum and The Hague

profile_positions.title: Volunteer Producer and Reporter Children's Television Programmes
